detaileddescription.para: Timeout for completion of HTTP rest client GET
Timeout for completion of HTTP rest client POST
Handle to store the main Command processor handle to be reused by ServalPAL thread
OS thread handle for Application controller

memberdef.name: WLANSetupInfo
memberdef.initializer: = { .IsEnterprise = false, .IsHostPgmEnabled = false, .SSID = WLAN_SSID, .Username = WLAN_PSK, .Password = WLAN_PSK, .IsStatic = WLAN_STATIC_IP, .IpAddr = WLAN_IP_ADDR, .GwAddr = WLAN_GW_ADDR, .DnsAddr = WLAN_DNS_ADDR, .Mask = WLAN_MASK, }

briefdescription.para: Gives control to the Application controller.

detaileddescription.para: This is a template function where the user can write his custom application.

briefdescription.para: To enable the necessary modules for the application.
Responsible for controlling the HTTP Example application control flow.

listitem.para: Synchronize the node with the SNTP server for time-stamp (if HTTPS)
Check whether the WLAN network connection is available
Do a HTTP rest client POST
Wait for INTER_REQUEST_INTERVAL if POST was successful
Do a HTTP rest client GET if POST was successful
Wait for INTER_REQUEST_INTERVAL if GET was successful

briefdescription.para: To setup the necessary modules for the application.
This will validate the WLAN network connectivity.

detaileddescription.para: If there is no connectivity then it will scan for the given network and try to reconnect

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK on success, or an error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: The HTTP GET request response callback.

detaileddescription.para:
responseContent
Pointer to the GET request response
responseContentLen
Length of the GET request response
isLastMessage
Boolean to represent if it is the last part of the ongoing message
Refer function definition for description
